specification_updates.highlight: Header renamed to Execution Payload Bid; conflicts to be resolved today
Keep header with same functionality; remove latest_block_hash; add bid field
Withdrawals spec frozen as-is for DevNet 0; overhaul deferred

devnet_planning.highlight: DevNet 0 target: end of October, single client minimum
Spec freeze for DevNet 0: current state plus header changes only
DevNet 0 scope: local building only, no builder API yet

beacon_api.highlight: V4 endpoint consensus for produce_block; removes blinded/unblinded complexity
Blob sidecar creation triggers on envelope release; no new endpoint

builder_protocol.highlight: Prism won't support blind signing; staked builders only
Builder API: no registrations needed; similar to current MEV-Boost flow
P2P bids provide decentralized fallback; HTTP direct connects to staked builders

action_items.action: Open PR to keep header, remove latest_block_hash, preserve bid field
Resolve conflicts and merge Execution Payload Bid rename PR today
Review fork choice test cases on HackMD; feedback requested

decisions.decision: Beacon API: Use V4 endpoint for produce_block (cleaner than modifying V3)
Consensus clients won't specify off-protocol relay support in spec
Builder API will not require registrations (unlike current MEV-Boost)

targets.target: End of October - DevNet 0 launch (single client minimum)
